page.description: Apply changes to existing rows in a table in the currently connected database using a result set.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = UpdateData(TableOwner as C, TableName as C, ResultSet as SQL::ResultSet [, EventScript as C])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: TableName
argument.description: The name of the table containing the data.

argument.name: ResultSet
argument.description: A SQL::ResultSet object that contains transactions to apply.

argument.name: EventScript
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". An Xbasic Script implementing any of the following functions: In each case, the Context argument is the connection itself.

page.discussion: The UpdateData() method applies changes to existing rows in a table in the currently connected database using a result set.
